name: Controlled useState
description: Interactive star rating widget with hover preview and keyboard support using controlled components with useState hook
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage current rating and hover preview states. Implements keyboard navigation with useEffect for event listeners. Provides full accessibility support with ARIA roles and labels.
features: Console logging in required format: 'Ocena: N'
Full accessibility support with ARIA roles
Bootstrap card layout with responsive design
Visual distinction between hover and committed states
